name: emr-exporter
description: Vendor agnostic application to export Universal Schema data from an Electronic Medical Record database and securely transfer results to a remote server.

scripts.build:linux: esbuild index.js --bundle --platform=node --loader:.node=file --outfile=build/out.js && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && cp $(command -v node) emr-exporter-linux && npx postject emr-exporter-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB build/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.build:windows: esbuild index.js --bundle --platform=node --loader:.node=file --outfile=build/out.js && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'emr-exporter-win.exe')" && npx postject emr-exporter-windows.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB build/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.check: npm audit && npm run depcheck && npm outdated && npm run stylecheck
scripts.pre-commit: npm run prettier && npm run lint

author: Jonathan Zacharuk <jzacharuk@gmail.com>
